Albert Park rapist’s identity revealed as Peter Kosetatino, five months after Auckland sentencing https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/albert-park-rapists-identity-revealed-as-peter-kosetatino- Five-months-after-auckland-sentencing/RNGE45BCA5E5NPJN5WDBX5IDUE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/albert-park-rapists-identity-revealed-as-peter-kosetatino- Five-months-after-auckland-sentencing/RNGE45BCA5E5NPJN5WDBX5IDUE/ Craig KapitanHis victim fought for the rapist's name to be made public. Now it has. Mon, 20 May 2024 02:55:04 +0000 Peter Kosetatino was 17 years old when he robbed a young couple at knifepoint at Auckland Central's popular Albert Park then raped the 21-year-old female victim in the bushes. He was sentenced to prison in December 2023 but his image could not be used until the lapse of his name suppression appeal. Photo / Michael Craig

Heavy rain warning among raft of severe weather advisories issued for North Island as subtropical rainmaker bears down https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/severe-weather-warnings-possible-as-heavy-downpours-loom-for-north-island/NY7PIDTWZNFS7NZIKGKYPLPO6U/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/severe-weather-warnings-possible-as-heavy-downpours-loom-for-north-island/NY7PIDTWZNFS7NZIKGKYPLPO6U/ An orange alert is already in place for one region, where up to 160mm could fall. Image / MetService
